Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel on Venice Lagoon”
Reviews.Author: venicefan
Reviews.Content: Stayed in June 2000 as part of our Cosmos Tourama 'Italian Intermezzo' holiday. Nice comfortable spacious rooms. Good quality of food despite 'fixed group' menus. Easy to get into Venice - I can remember getting to the Fusina terminal then catching a waterbus to St Marks (that was the case then, but since 2000 the vaporetto service goes to Zattere). Check out the up to date vaporetto timetables - with the exception of Lines 1 and 2 serving the Grand Canal, quite a few of the 'giracitta' service numbers have changed (from 2/11/11), although not a great difficulty for 'old hands' in Venice! Don't be afraid to ask the vaporetto staff for help!

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for few nights stay”
Reviews.Author: CatherinneP
Reviews.Content: I was in this hotel last year, and I have to say, that in this price is not bad. The only problem is connection with Venice, but with this amount of money you can't expect anything better especially in Italy. The stuff very friendly and helpfull.

Reviews.Title: “very good place !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: nordamerica
Reviews.Content: large rooms, free parking, goog breakfast, ok!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! the price is the best!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! receptionist gianni fantastic

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Gallimberti
HotelInfo.Address: Via Malcanton, 33 | Malcontenta, 30033 Venice, Italy
